Name: Doug and Lily
About the game: Doug and Lily go to rescue the child from wizard. Doug and Lily. It's platformer with a pleasant pixel graphic, where you expect incredible adventures. The player, together with the brave warrior Doug and his lovely wife Lily, has to overcome many difficulties in the way of rescuing his son, who has been abducted by a villain whose name is unknown to anyone. But nothing will stop loving parents on the way to their son, because they have assistants dinosaurs, a pile of rocks, and you!
